docs.snippet: The one-year deal was believed to be worth at least $250 million to the N.F.L., which wants Thursday games to someday approach the viewership of Sunday and Monday games....
docs.lead_paragraph: The one-year deal was believed to be worth at least $250 million to the N.F.L., which wants Thursday games to someday approach the viewership of Sunday and Monday games.
docs.abstract: CBS announces that it will carry eight Thursday night football games in 2014 on a one-year contract that is believed to be worth at least $250 million.

headline.main: CBS Will Broadcast Thursday Night Games
headline.print_headline: Thursday Games are Going to CBS

docs.snippet: Seattle is a city not widely known for inchoate screaming and wildness. Until this football season, that is....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seattle is a city not widely known for inchoate screaming and wildness. Until this football season, that is.
docs.abstract: Hundreds of thousands of people crowd six-deep or more in Seattle, along closed streets for a celebratory parade over their city's first Super Bowl win; Seattle Seahawks opened a civic-size pressure release valve for a city that is not widely known for inchoate screaming and wildness.

headline.main: ‘Chill’ Seattle Savors Its Super Bowl Moment in the Sun
headline.print_headline: ‘Chill’ Seattle Savors Its Super Bowl Moment in the Sun

headline.main: For Seattle’s Celebration, Russell Wilson Is an Unofficial M.V.P.
